info.author: Thierry Zamofing
info.description:
PowerBrickIDE
=============

This repository contains development tools for the Delta Tau PowerBrick.

these are tools to do similar things as the IDE from Delta Tau but independently of Windows

current tools consist of:

- PBGatherPlot
- PBInspect
- gpasciiCommunicator (located in the repository ppmac_configuration_script)

For the moment there exists a module to have all tools available on linux (tested on gfalc).

To load the module type:

	module use /afs/psi.ch/user/z/zamofing_t/public/modulefiles/
	module load PowerBrickTools

The main Programs are:

	PBGatherPlot -h
	PBInspect -h
	gpasciiCommander -h


Module installation/update
--------------------------

Update Modules is done with the script:
/afs/psi.ch/user/z/zamofing_t/public/PowerBrickTools.sh
(will be changed when a official tool location is known)

these are tools to do similar things as the IDE from Delta Tau but independently of Windows

current tools consist of:

  • PBGatherPlot
  • PBInspect
  • gpasciiCommunicator (located in the repository ppmac_configuration_script)

For the moment there exists a module to have all tools available on linux (tested on gfalc).

To load the module type:

module use /afs/psi.ch/user/z/zamofing_t/public/modulefiles/ module load PowerBrickTools

The main Programs are:

PBGatherPlot -h PBInspect -h gpasciiCommander -h
